# AI in Agriculture

## Banana Disease Detection

![AI-powered banana disease detection](banana.jpg)

Selvaraj *et al.* developed an AI-powered system for banana pest and disease detection [@selvaraj2019banana].

+ Improves early identification of diseases  
+ Reduces dependence on manual inspection  
+ Potential to scale across plantations
